016package io.micronaut.maven;
017
018import io.micronaut.maven.core.MicronautRuntime;
019import io.micronaut.maven.jib.JibMicronautExtension;
020import io.micronaut.maven.services.ApplicationConfigurationService;
021import io.micronaut.maven.services.DockerService;
022import io.micronaut.maven.jib.JibConfigurationService;
023import io.micronaut.maven.services.ExecutorService;
024import org.apache.maven.execution.MavenSession;
025import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecution;
026import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException;
027import org.apache.maven.plugins.annotations.Mojo;
028import org.apache.maven.plugins.annotations.ResolutionScope;
029import org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject;
030import org.apache.maven.shared.invoker.MavenInvocationException;
031
032import javax.inject.Inject;
033import java.io.File;
034import java.io.IOException;
035import java.nio.file.Files;
036import java.nio.file.Path;
037import java.nio.file.Paths;
038import java.util.ArrayList;
039import java.util.List;
040import java.util.Optional;
041import java.util.stream.Collectors;
042import java.util.stream.Stream;
043
044import static io.micronaut.maven.DockerNativeMojo.ARGS_FILE_PROPERTY_NAME;
045
046/**
047 * <p>Generates a <code>Dockerfile</code> depending on the <code>packaging</code> and <code>micronaut.runtime</code>
048 * properties.
049 *
050 * <pre>mvn mn:dockerfile -Dpackaging=docker-native -Dmicronaut.runtime=lambda</pre>
051 *
052 * @author Álvaro Sánchez-Mariscal
053 * @since 1.1
054 */
055@Mojo(name = "dockerfile", requiresDependencyResolution = ResolutionScope.COMPILE_PLUS_RUNTIME)
056public class DockerfileMojo extends AbstractDockerMojo {
057
058    public static final String DOCKERFILE = "Dockerfile";
059    public static final String DOCKERFILE_AWS_CUSTOM_RUNTIME = "DockerfileAwsCustomRuntime";
060    public static final String DOCKERFILE_NATIVE = "DockerfileNative";
061    public static final String DOCKERFILE_CRAC = "DockerfileCrac";
062    public static final String DOCKERFILE_CRAC_CHECKPOINT = "DockerfileCracCheckpoint";
063    public static final String DOCKERFILE_CRAC_CHECKPOINT_FILE = "Dockerfile.crac.checkpoint";
064    public static final String DOCKERFILE_NATIVE_DISTROLESS = "DockerfileNativeDistroless";
065    public static final String DOCKERFILE_NATIVE_STATIC = "DockerfileNativeStatic";
066    public static final String DOCKERFILE_NATIVE_ORACLE_CLOUD = "DockerfileNativeOracleCloud";
067
068    private final ExecutorService executorService;
069
070    @Inject
071    public DockerfileMojo(MavenProject mavenProject, DockerService dockerService, JibConfigurationService jibConfigurationService,
072                          ApplicationConfigurationService applicationConfigurationService, ExecutorService executorService,
073                          MavenSession mavenSession, MojoExecution mojoExecution) {
074        super(mavenProject, jibConfigurationService, applicationConfigurationService, dockerService, mavenSession, mojoExecution);
075        this.executorService = executorService;
076    }
077
078    @Override
079    public void execute() throws MojoExecutionException {
080        MicronautRuntime runtime = MicronautRuntime.valueOf(micronautRuntime.toUpperCase());
081        Packaging packaging = Packaging.of(mavenProject.getPackaging());
082        try {
083            copyDependencies();
084            Optional<File> dockerfile = switch (packaging) {
085                case DOCKER_NATIVE -> buildDockerfileNative(runtime);
086                case DOCKER -> buildDockerfile(runtime);
087                case DOCKER_CRAC -> buildCracDockerfile(runtime);
088                default -> throw new MojoExecutionException("Packaging is set to [" + packaging + "]. To generate a Dockerfile, set the packaging to either [" + Packaging.DOCKER.id() + "] or [" + Packaging.DOCKER_NATIVE.id() + "]");
089            };
090
091            dockerfile.ifPresent(file -> getLog().info("Dockerfile written to: " + file.getAbsolutePath()));
092
093        } catch (IOException | MavenInvocationException e) {
094            throw new MojoExecutionException(e.getMessage(), e);
095        }
096    }
097
098    private Optional<File> buildDockerfile(MicronautRuntime runtime) throws IOException {
099        File dockerfile;
100        switch (runtime.getBuildStrategy()) {
101            case ORACLE_FUNCTION -> {
102                dockerfile = dockerService.loadDockerfileAsResource("DockerfileOracleCloud");
103                processOracleFunctionDockerfile(dockerfile);
104            }
105            case LAMBDA, DEFAULT -> {
106                dockerfile = dockerService.loadDockerfileAsResource(DOCKERFILE);
107                processDockerfile(dockerfile);
108            }
109            default -> throw new IllegalStateException("Unexpected value: " + runtime.getBuildStrategy());
110        }
111        return Optional.ofNullable(dockerfile);
112    }
113
114    private Optional<File> buildCracDockerfile(MicronautRuntime runtime) throws IOException, MojoExecutionException {
115        File dockerfile;
116        switch (runtime.getBuildStrategy()) {
117            case ORACLE_FUNCTION -> throw new MojoExecutionException("Oracle Functions are currently unsupported");
118            case LAMBDA -> throw new MojoExecutionException("Lambda Functions are currently unsupported");
119            case DEFAULT -> {
120                dockerfile = dockerService.loadDockerfileAsResource(DOCKERFILE_CRAC_CHECKPOINT, DOCKERFILE_CRAC_CHECKPOINT_FILE);
121                processDockerfile(dockerfile);
122                dockerfile = dockerService.loadDockerfileAsResource(DOCKERFILE_CRAC);
123                processDockerfile(dockerfile);
124            }
125            default -> throw new IllegalStateException("Unexpected value: " + runtime.getBuildStrategy());
126        }
127        return Optional.ofNullable(dockerfile);
128    }
129
130    private void processOracleFunctionDockerfile(File dockerfile) throws IOException {
131        if (dockerfile != null) {
132            List<String> allLines = Files.readAllLines(dockerfile.toPath());
133            String projectFnVersion = JibMicronautExtension.determineProjectFnVersion(System.getProperty("java.version"));
134            allLines.add(0, allLines.remove(0) + projectFnVersion);
135            String entrypoint = JibMicronautExtension.buildProjectFnEntrypoint()
136                    .stream()
137                    .map(s -> "\"" + s + "\"")
138                    .collect(Collectors.joining(", "));
139
140            allLines.add("ENTRYPOINT [" + entrypoint + "]");
141
142            Files.write(dockerfile.toPath(), allLines);
143        }
144    }
145
146    private Optional<File> buildDockerfileNative(MicronautRuntime runtime) throws IOException, MavenInvocationException {
147        maybeUpdateBaseImageBasedOnArchitecture(runtime);
148
149        getLog().info("Generating GraalVM args file");
150        executorService.invokeGoal("org.graalvm.buildtools:native-maven-plugin", "write-args-file");
151        File dockerfile;
152        switch (runtime.getBuildStrategy()) {
153            case LAMBDA -> dockerfile = dockerService.loadDockerfileAsResource(DOCKERFILE_AWS_CUSTOM_RUNTIME);
154            case ORACLE_FUNCTION -> dockerfile = dockerService.loadDockerfileAsResource(DOCKERFILE_NATIVE_ORACLE_CLOUD);
155            case DEFAULT -> {
156                String dockerfileName = DOCKERFILE_NATIVE;
157                if (Boolean.TRUE.equals(staticNativeImage)) {
158                    getLog().info("Generating a static native image");
159                    dockerfileName = DockerfileMojo.DOCKERFILE_NATIVE_STATIC;
160                } else if (baseImageRun.contains("distroless")) {
161                    getLog().info("Generating a mostly static native image");
162                    dockerfileName = DockerfileMojo.DOCKERFILE_NATIVE_DISTROLESS;
163                }
164                dockerfile = dockerService.loadDockerfileAsResource(dockerfileName);
165            }
166            default -> throw new IllegalStateException("Unexpected value: " + runtime.getBuildStrategy());
167        }
168        processDockerfile(dockerfile);
169        return Optional.ofNullable(dockerfile);
170    }
171
172    private void processDockerfile(File dockerfile) throws IOException {
173        if (dockerfile != null) {
174            List<String> allLines = Files.readAllLines(dockerfile.toPath());
175            List<String> result = new ArrayList<>();
176
177            for (String line : allLines) {
178                if (!line.startsWith("ARG")) {
179                    if (line.contains("BASE_IMAGE_RUN")) {
180                        result.add(line.replace("${BASE_IMAGE_RUN}", baseImageRun));
181                    } else if (line.contains("BASE_IMAGE")) {
182                        result.add(line.replace("${BASE_IMAGE}", getFrom()));
183                    } else if (line.contains("BASE_JAVA_IMAGE")) {
184                        result.add(line.replace("${BASE_JAVA_IMAGE}", getBaseImage()));
185                    } else if (line.contains("EXTRA_CMD")) {
186                        if (baseImageRun.contains("alpine-glibc")) {
187                            result.add("RUN apk update && apk add libstdc++");
188                        } else {
189                            result.add("");
190                        }
191                    } else if (line.contains("GRAALVM_") || line.contains("CLASS_NAME")) {
192                        result.add(line
193                                .replace("${GRAALVM_JVM_VERSION}", graalVmJvmVersion())
194                                .replace("${GRAALVM_ARCH}", graalVmArch())
195                                .replace("${CLASS_NAME}", mainClass)
196                        );
197                    } else if (line.contains("PORT")) {
198                        result.add(line.replace("${PORT}", getPort()));
199                    } else {
200                        result.add(line);
201                    }
202                }
203            }
204
205            String argsFile = mavenProject.getProperties().getProperty(ARGS_FILE_PROPERTY_NAME);
206            if (argsFile == null) {
207                Path targetPath = Paths.get(mavenProject.getBuild().getDirectory());
208                try (Stream<Path> listStream = Files.list(targetPath)) {
209                    Path argsFilePath = listStream
210                            .map(path -> path.getFileName().toString())
211                            .filter(f -> f.startsWith("native-image") && f.endsWith("args"))
212                            .map(targetPath::resolve)
213                            .findFirst()
214                            .orElse(null);
215                    if (argsFilePath != null) {
216                        argsFile = argsFilePath.toAbsolutePath().toString();
217                    }
218                }
219            }
220            if (argsFile != null) {
221                List<String> allNativeImageBuildArgs = MojoUtils.computeNativeImageArgs(nativeImageBuildArgs, baseImageRun, argsFile);
222                getLog().info("GraalVM native image build args: " + allNativeImageBuildArgs);
223            }
224
225            if (appArguments != null && !appArguments.isEmpty()) {
226                getLog().info("Using application arguments: " + appArguments);
227                result.add(getCmd());
228            }
229
230            Files.write(dockerfile.toPath(), result);
231        }
232    }
233}
